tweet: Don't miss the first quarterly IOTA Insights call tomorrow at 2 PM EST/8 PM CEST. Hear from people in the IOTA Ecosystem to discuss progress, exciting news and updates related to the adoption of #IOTA, and our vision for the future.  https://t.co/GjJPoSSOWC  #IOTAInsights

This week for #IOTA #IOTAstrong  - IOTA insights is introduced - IOTA Links with STMicroelectronics - IOTA Announces $5 Million in Grants for Coordicide-Related Research - IOTA Open Sources the GoShimmer Prototype - Sergey Ivancheglo departs from the IOTA Foundation (Not IOTA)
Send #IOTA transactions without knowing trits, trytes, seeds, nodes, proof-of-work. Send IOTA by email. The brilliant folks at @delion_io make it possible. Human or device.  https://t.co/zT5uaAT58O

#IOTA via the PayPal way, where users and devices only need to know the email address to send and receive transactions. #EMPWRIoT empowers you with devices that connect wirelessly. Bluetooth, WIFI, 3G, 4G, LoRawan, Nb-IoT, Cat-1, Cat-M1, GPS, GPS-RTK.

Real World Usecase - Automatic and instant inventory. Thanks to feeless zero-value transactions, data streams allow for an automatic instant and continuous inventory of a shops goods, which in return could trigger a reorder if the stock falls below a preset treshold. #IOTA #DLT  https://t.co/L1B3tD5lBU
can’t be bullish on machine to machine economy without being bullish on #IOTA because it’s the only crypto designed from the ground up for the #IoT use case. just sayin’ 🤷🏻‍♂️ #IOTAstrong
